locomotion definition: an act or the power of moving from place to place.
Robot locomotion - Robot locomotion is the collective name for the various methods that robots use to transport themselves from place to place.
climbing - Climbing is the activity of using one's hands and feet (or indeed any other part of the body) to ascend a steep object.

Animal locomotion - Animal locomotion, which is the act of self-propulsion by an animal, has many manifestations, including running, swimming, jumping and flying.

* walking

* jumping, including leaping gaits
* crawling
* climbing
* swimming
* flying
